Name: Moon Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cleffa, Clefairy, and Clefable.  Swap a Clefa-Claw and a Clefa-Card for a Moon Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
